edu.harvard.integer.common.exception

Class IntegerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • edu.harvard.integer.common.exception.IntegerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayableInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class IntegerException
extends java.lang.Exception
implements DisplayableInterface
    All exceptions created by the Integer system will be an IntegerException. The exception will take an ErrorCode and optional arguments. The cause of the exception may be includes when known.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
